select count(1)
from tb_car_auction tca join tb_car_basic tcb on tca.business_id=tcb.business_id join tb_car_detection det on tcb.last_detection_id=det.id join tb_basic_business bus on tcb.business_id=bus.business_id
join tb_process tp on tcb.business_id=tp.business_id and tp.process_result=1 join tb_process_type tpt on tpt.type_id=tp.process_typeid and tpt.type_code='carAuctionAply'
tca.status in ('04','05')
and tca.status =#{type}
and (tcb.brand_name LIKE "%"#{vehicleBrand}"%" or tcb.model LIKE "%"#{carModel}"%")
and tca.auction_id =#{auctionId}
and tca.auction_end_time>=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')

select tcar.reg_tel,ifnull(max(tcar.offer_amount),tca.starting_price) offer_amount FROM tb_car_auction tca left join tb_car_auction_reg tcar on tca.auction_id=tcar.auction_id
and tca.auction_id= #{auctionId}

select tcb.brand_name vehicleBrand, tcb.model carModel, tca.auction_id auctionId, tca.business_id businessId, tca.auction_start_time startPriceDate, tca.auction_end_time endPriceDate, det.car_position `position`, tcr.offer_amount myPrice from tb_car_auction tca inner join tb_car_basic tcb on tca.business_id=tcb.business_id inner join tb_car_detection det on tcb.last_detection_id=det.id inner join tb_car_auction_reg tcr on tca.auction_id=tcr.auction_id
and tcr.user_id =#{userId}
and (tcb.brand_name LIKE "%"#{vehicleBrand}"%" or tcb.model LIKE "%"#{carModel}"%")
order BY tca.auction_end_time asc

SELECT c.reg_id id, c.rowNum seqNum, c.username userName, c.reg_cert_id idCard, c.reg_tel telephone, c.offer_time bidTime, c.offer_amount bidPrice, c.remark remark, c.is_auction_success isAuctionSuccess FROM ( SELECT * ,@i :=@i + 1 rowNum FROM tb_car_auction_reg a, (SELECT @i := 0) AS b
a.business_id=#{businessId}
AND ( a.username LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR a.reg_cert_id LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR a.reg_tel LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" )
ORDER BY a.offer_time DESC ) AS c
